text: TOP 09 is a political party in the Czech Republic. It is a right-wing, conservative party. The chairman of the party is former finance minister Miroslav Kalousek and the honorary chairman is former foreign minister Karel Schwarzenberg. TOP 09 have 26 members in the Chamber of Deputies and 4 members in the European parliament. The party's policies are based on conservatism and pro-Europeanism. == Other websites == * Official website Category:Conservative parties Category:Politics of the Czech Republic Category:Organizations based in the Czech Republic
title: TOP 09
